meanings.definition: Having or showing excessive or offensive sexual desire.
meanings.sent1: His lecherousness gaze made her uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The movie portrayed the villain with a lecherousness demeanor.
meanings.sent3: The lecherousness old man kept winking at the waitress.
meanings.sent4: The lecherousness atmosphere of the club made her want to leave.
meanings.sent5: The lecherousness look in his eyes sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or inciting lustful behavior.
meanings.sent1: The lecherousness comments made everyone blush.

meanings.sent3: His lecherousness jokes always lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: The lecherousness party atmosphere was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The lecherousness aura around him was unmistakable.
